sentence.text: Further functional studies show that forced expression of positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II in lung cancer cells obviously promotes cell proliferation and invasion, whereas inhibits cell apoptosis.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Furthermore, positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II is associated with unfavorable overall survival (n=866, p=0.004) and represents an independent prognostic factor (HR=2.36, p=0.000) in lung adenocarcinoma (ADC) patients, but is not associated with overall survival of squamous cell carcinoma (SCC) patients (n=524, p=0.27).

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
